type: Contract Request for Quotation - Competitive with Bidding
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
tags: air or gas tanks or cylinders
full_summary:
Cylinders and Parts Kits
==========================

**Tender Reference Number**
---------------------------

* Reference Number: CB-967-76859805
* Solicitation Number: W8482-242220/A

**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence invites tenders for the supply of cylinders and parts kits. The tender is open to all qualified suppliers.

**Goods Required**
------------------

The following goods are required:

* 300 cylinders, compressed gas, air technical ( Item 1)
* 588 parts kits, valve ( Item 3)

The goods are to be delivered to the following locations:

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia ( Item 1 and Item 3)
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia ( Item 2 and Item 4)

**Trade Agreement**
-------------------

This tender is open to suppliers who are eligible to participate under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

The selection of the successful supplier will be based on the lowest priced bid.

**Bidding Requirements**
-------------------------

Bidders must submit their bids in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Risk Mitigation**
------------------

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Requests for exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation will not be considered.

**Documents**
----------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact:

* Johan Vizcaya Collado
* Phone: (555) 555-5555
* Email: [johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca](mailto:johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Closing Date**
------------------

The tender closing date is 2023-12-01 at
